DescriptionTemplates: A {Adjective} gallery of pipes and conduits fills this passage. {Detail}. You must navigate carefully through the industrial maze.
This {Adjective} utility corridor is choked with infrastructure. {Detail}. The pipes carry who-knows-what.
You weave through a {Adjective} forest of conduits. {Detail}. The density of pipes makes progress slow.
Details: Steam vents from a cracked joint, obscuring your view
The pipes are labeled in faded Aetheric script
Some conduits still pulse with faint energy
Valves and pressure gauges line the walls
The sound of flowing liquid echoes through the pipes
